short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Skip the extra username prompt for wccnet.edu

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The process of logging onto Blackboard as a Washtenaw Community College student requires entering your username twice! This extension skips one of these so that you only have to type it in once.
